overview: Krystian Hofer is a music academy student. He suffers from an undiagnosed illness. One day he notices that someone is watching him. Through this person, Krystian discovers the mystery of his existence.

production_companies.name: Państwowa Wyższa Szkoła Filmowa Telewizyjna i Teatralna (Łódź)

title: Na swoje podobieństwo
